Title: [ANN][ICO] BAAPPAY - The Evolution of the Payment Platform is Here
Body: Usually, when you hear something is for free, it always seems like it’s too good to be true. Your instinctual reaction is to be skeptical. You assume that there has to some sort of catch. If not a catch, there must be some sort of loophole that they will eventually get me with that will end up costing me time or money or both.  The team at BaapPay understands your skepticism. But we want to reassure you that we do not want anything from you. Our goal is simple: to make cryptocurrency as accessible as possible to as many people as possible across the world. It might seem like an ambitious task…and you’re right, it is! But we are committed to this journey. And this journey begins now, with the introduction of the Baap Pay Point-of-Sales (POS) System.  The BaapPOS is a cloud based tool (see image below) that allows any sized brick and mortar store to take cryptocurrency payments. This means that people who want to pay for a soda or a book using Bitcoin or Ethereum, can easily do so at your retail establishment. But the best part about this software is that it is absolutely FREE! You didn’t read that wrong. Your eyes are not playing tricks on you. This POS is completely free!  The BaapPOS can be used on multiple devices (i.e. laptops and mobile) as well as for multiple different business means. To learn more about this new tool, please visit the following link: https://baappaytoken.com/technology/#webbased  If you’re interested in joining the dozens of others global merchants for early access to BaapPOS, please fill in your information on the following webpage:  http://baappay.com/admin/signup/  For any questions or if you’d like to join the discussion, feel free to become a part of our telegram group: https://t.me/BaapPay_Official.

Author: Baappay
Title: [ANN][ICO] BAAPPAY - The Evolution of the Payment Platform is Here
Body: Yes your are correct, however, payment licenses would be related to how we release our platform. For example, if we were to release just the Point of sale software, would have different requirements. Thus, within a month or two of completion, we would be able to integrate payment for both fiat and crypto, via third party. Our liquidity pool etc, would not be applicable at this time. At this time, we might offer an option of Bitcoin convert to Eur (only these currencies) to your bank account, however, if this were to be implemented, transactions would be not instantaneously. You would need to wait for full confirmations. (this function would be apart of our full platform).  For the devices, although they may have the capability of receiving and transmitting payment (which you will be able to see in the demo), however, without proper certifications and meeting standard requirements, we will not be able to obtain payment licensing. (North American has stricter standards than other countries)  This why we have stated in our road map, that device integration will be released in Q3.  More specifically we expect it to be 5-6 months, as payment processor / Acquirer would than need to verify the certifications and standards of the devices and receiving/transmitting capabilities.  As for our full complete platform payment gateway, again, will need to proper certifications and meet standard requirements to obtain any type of payment license. Thus, as stated before, payment licensing will be required as correlated to what is being released.

Author: Baappay
Title: [ANN][ICO] BAAPPAY - The Evolution of the Payment Platform is Here
Body: I understand your concerns, however, I would like to state that we are not here to argue who is better, as we have stated before, that Pundix looks like a great solid project, which already has a product on the market. However, we are explaining the difference between the two projects.    We cannot locate their Whitepaper since the link is not active, however, we will make references to prior articles,    from https://bitcoinexchangeguide.com/pundi-x/  The company wants to make it easier for brick-and-mortar businesses to accept digital currencies in-store, Our aim is to serve both online and offline retailers, not just brick and mortar.    The system involves the following core features:   The Pundi X Pass, which lets you store cryptocurrency securely, buy and sell digital tokens with a single swipe, and spend it over a card at Pundi X POS terminals At the moment, we will not offer a "BaapPay" card to purchase items, on our platform you need to use our wallet/accounts  Mobile payment integration, with digital wallets that you can use to buy, sell, and accept cryptocurrency (Pundi X plans to integrate itself with existing digital wallet solutions) We will not integrate with digital wallets at this time. However, since our POS software is almost ready to be released, will integrate our POS with existing payment gateways, . However, that is not in our road map because it is not our final product. We plan to be our own payment gateway solution.(depending on the region, we might partner up with another gatway solution in conjunctions with ours.)     Top-up using fiat currencies or a bank card at any Pundi X location; or, top up your balance over your mobile wallet We will not have this function, as our system is not based on a card. Balances, crypto and fiat, will available on our payment gateway accounts. These account will be connect to your bank account and wallet.  Use cryptocurrency to pay utility bills As of this moment, we do not have the option because we do not offer a card that can be funded,  Use cryptocurrency to buy and sell goods this is basic of all payments  WHAT THEY HAVE THAT WE DO NOT  establish credit history and reduce financial risk- We do not offer this function  intelligence clearing system to increase the value of the store properties We do not have this function, however, if I understand correctly, it can be comparable to our liquidity pool. Yet, our liquidity pool is not based upon prior sales and history which is incorporated into a intelligence system. Our liquidity pool is based upon available funds, regardless past history  Recently, they have added the options of  3rd party Payment gateway integration, Again, We will integrate with third parties . However, that is not in our road map because it is not our final product. We plan to process the payment ourselves with our gateway.  support alipay, e2pay, go-pay etc We are not sure how they are going to do this, however, in our system, this payment would not go directly to the account holder account. It would be processed as a debit payment and processed through the payment gateway.  WHAT WE OFFER THEY DO NOT HAVE (from our understanding)  Our Own App store (dev can hold account within our payment gateway for payment) Our own Fiat & cryptocurrency payment gateway Fiat-crypto conversion with your own account fait-fait conversion with your own account third party POS integration Liquidity pool   Ecom Fiat & cryptocurrency payment gateway Resolution center Connect bank account to BaapPay account  SIMILARITIES  POS system Devices, Selling and buying crypto, ( however, ours will be done within our payment gateway)  Since it is a payment system, there will also be other similarities.  NOTE  It would be impossible for us to copy their idea, considering the fact that we are in the process of releasing our POS software. Also, a platform of this magnitude cannot be reseached or developed with a couple of months. The research has been in place for over a 1 year.    YOUR OTHER QUESTON  As for SDK, why would that be regulated? If you are referring to integration of fiat and crypto,we are in a different situations. Yes, there are strict regulations, however, if followed properly, with proper connections, it can be done. Also, we are located in Canada and pundix is located in Indonesia. Please refer to the below  https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-pundi-x/  Jurisdiction risks. Will this device be legally allowed in retail stores? Pundi responds to this question, “The Indonesian authority has stated that cryptocurrency can be bought and sold as virtual goods. However, it is not allowed to be treated as currency. We will abide by this rule. We are in the final phrase of agreement to use an e-money license with a partnering company. According to Indonesian law, an e-money license is one of the essential licenses in the Fintech business in Indonesia, it allows the user to deposit, pay, withdraw and transfer money online. We are also actively seeking counsel from Indonesia’s Central Bank (BI) and Financial Service Authority (OJK). -1?   As stated many times before, we are not here to contemplate the better project of the two. It is great to see a project that is actually launching their product into the market. This is only beneficial for  pundix, however, us and the rest of the crypto community.  The greater crypto adoption amongst the public, the greater business opportunities we all receive.

Title: [ANN][ICO] BAAPPAY - The Evolution of the Payment Platform is Here
Body: We personally do not believe that there is a comparable  product to BaapPay on the market. Yes, there are similarities with different projects, however, they do not offer all the functionalities into one project.  One project may offer a liquidity pool, however, they might not offer fiat merchant services. Another project may offer a Appstore,  however, will use a third party to process their payments, and etc.  Our platform combines many aspects; Payment gateway, POS, and app store and even a cryptocurrency exchange.  Also, will do not want to be dependent upon third party services, ie, processing payments under a third visa/mastercard account, as they may deny your service at any time, if some sort of issues were to arise.  Pundix looks like a really great project, however, I think you are comparing two different projects. Unlike Pundix, on our platform, our merchants do not have to use our POS system. A third party company can develop and deploy their own POS app on our system.  In this situation, merchants would just use our payment gateway, devices, app store.  Example.  company X is a well know POS software company, they can develop and deploy their app onto our platform. Company X would not be limited to only our platform. As they may have another payment processor for their android/ ios platform.  Company X now offers their customers different options and are not restricted to one payment processor. In addition, developers may port apps from android or develop specialty apps for our devices and integrate them into any POS app.  We also offer a economical device, “MPOS” which can turn your desktop, mobile or tablet into a payment terminal.  Another feature is the liquidity pool, giving merchants the option to convert crypto in fiat and guaranteeing the transaction in seconds.  As for product deployment, we are not that far behind Pundi X(in terms of deploying the same type service), as our POS should be ready for public beta testing within the next couple of weeks and a full release soon after. Within 3-5 months we shall have completed the deployment architecture integration of both devices, meaning that we can plug in any payment gateway, be it ours or a third party. ( which is what i think they are deploying now). Therefore, even though we will started 4 months after them, if were were deploying the same services,(we still have the payment gateways and app store to develop) we would only be 3-5 months behind.  Also, we are not sure if they are offering PCI certified devices, however, in most first world countries, ie North America, Many European countries etc. only PCI certified devices are allowed to be integrate and transmit payments. However, with that said, it still looks like a great project.  As for regulations, it is dependant upon each region and country. Each will have their own rules and regulations that must be complied with. Thus, our system will have limitations and will be developed to each region’s regulations which would be relayed according to the users IP.

Author: Baappay
Title: [ANN][ICO] BAAPPAY - The Evolution of the Payment Platform is Here
Body: Stripe started accepting crypto on their payment platform, however, they had to abandon it because Merchants were complaining about confirmations. It became a nuance and a risk for merchants because they had to wait a long time before the transaction was fully confirmed. If they didn't wait for full confirmations, they ran the risk of double dipping, thus, would be defrauded by the customer. However, in our platform, our liquidity pool would solve that dilemma. Instead of waiting for each transaction to be confirmed by the blockchain, our state channels allow the customer transactions to be funded through a liquidity pool. This removes the need for each payment to be individually written to the blockchain, and makes point of sale purchases instant.  The security is that all transactions will happen within the exchanges wallet. Therefore, a transaction will only be processed if the user has the cleared funds available.

Author: Baappay
Title: [ANN][ICO] BAAPPAY - The Evolution of the Payment Platform is Here
Body: WEBSITE |WHITEPAPER | TOKEN SALE | ROAD MAP |TEAM | TECHNOLOGY  https://i.imgur.com/EOiEOId.jpg  BaapPay is a multi-layered platform that integrates both fiat and cryptocurrency payment services for merchants, that will confirm and guarantee all payments in seconds.   VISION  https://i.imgur.com/cXsF1cd.jpg    BaapPay is a multi-layered platform which features a payment gateway, point of sale system and software, and our very own BaapWorld app store which we will elaborate on later in this document. We believe that as cryptocurrency adoption further penetrates businesses and the lives of consumers, there will be a point where; buying, selling, and trading cryptocurrency will be a part of everyday living. The payment platform is built to work with existing credit card infrastructure; including credit/debit cards and will employ payment processing protocols and flows for cryptocurrency similar to traditional electronic payment systems. This approach should enable easier and faster adoption of cryptocurrency as a mainstream payment platform, which in turn gives the merchants a higher level of convenience to accept any method of payment that is presented to them by the customer.  OUR PLATFORM  https://i.imgur.com/DUMWjSf.jpg  Payment Gateway Our payment gateway is a PayPal like interface that allows merchants to collect fiat or cryptocurrency payment for their goods and services. It also accepts traditional debit or credit card payments for Brick and mortar and online e-commerce  Web Based POS Merchants will also have access to our web-based point of sale system that comes free with our payment gateway. The POS will allow merchants to integrate both fiat and crypto into to sales accounting, inventory, loyalty tools and enable them to track employees, use multi locations and more much.  BaapWorld App Store Our Android-based BaapWorld app store. Devs would be able to download our simple SDK to create apps utilizing our devices functionalities and consumer would get access to their favorite Android apps.  https://i.imgur.com/2Zavigy.jpg  Liquidity Pool  https://i.imgur.com/G6dX6ZW.jpg  Instead of waiting for each transaction to be confirmed by the blockchain,our smart contract allows the customer transactions to be funded through a liquidity pool.This protocol removes the need for each payment to be individually written to the blockchain,thus makes point of sale purchases instant.  Payment gateway  https://i.imgur.com/cYeKjHj.jpg  Payment Gateway: Our payment gateway will allow merchants to collect both cryptocurrency and fiat currency.  Crypto to Fiat : In our platform we give, both Buyers and Seller, the ability to convert their from cryptocurrency to fiat, or vice versa.  Online payments system : Similar to PayPal, BaapPay would support online money transfers and serve as an electronic alternative to traditional paper methods like checks and money orders. However, unlike PayPal BaapPay would incorporate cryptocurrency.  Virtual Terminal : BaapPay will operate as a payment processor for online vendors, auction sites and other commercial users for selling good and service.  Merchant : Merchant will have access to both traditional payments, ie debit & credit card and cryptocurrency under one merchant-provider account.   Features  BaapPay will carry the major cryptocurrencies, such as ETH, BTC, LTC, XRP, BCH and our own BAAP Tokens. BaapPay will always be evaluating which cryptocurrencies should be added to our platform, and we will listen to the feedback from both consumers and merchants regarding the cryptocurrencies that are most popularly asked for which we may not have listed at that time. Peer-to- Peer Transactions for both fiat and cryptocurrencies.  Pay for online purchases using your credit/debit cards or cryptocurrencies Merchant has a choice to either automatically convert the cryptocurrency into fiat or keep the cryptocurrencies, which they can either convert later-on or spend as cryptocurrency.  Buyer and Seller features Buyer-sellers: BaapPay will connect Credit, Debit card, different cryptocurrencies and Bank Accounts into one interface thus allowing the account holder to transfer money through to a single account. Sellers can add a BaapPay purchase/order button on their websites, and blogs within minutes.  Payment Gateway Deployment Process  https://i.imgur.com/aNSKs06.jpg  Our payment gateway can be deployed on th any of the devices which includes Smart Terminal, Payment Terminal, Android Devices & e-commerce.The payment data enters the system via the POI device and then makes its way through processing as shown in the image. Our Cloud server decides payment processing host based on the customer’s input. Fiat Payment will be sent to the Fiat Payment processing host. Cryptocurrency Payment will be sent to the Cryptocurrency Exchange processing host.  POS System  https://i.imgur.com/2TxeAYI.jpg  Merchants will also have access to our fully integrated Point-of-Sale software, which could be accessed from a web browser, mobile or our smart terminal. This POS system is a fully integrated business management software.The most advance features in our POS system is that: it can account for sales, inventory, track employees,use multi-locations, loyalty tools,however, more importantly, it can accept fiat and cryptocurrency while integrating cryptocurrency transaction. Lastly,since Baap POS is a cloud based software, all transactions can be viewed real-time using any device within the POS system .  App word  https://i.imgur.com/WhD0ZMS.jpg  Want to develop your own app with BaapPay technology? BaapWorld is an App store that runs on Android, giving developers the ability to download our simple SDK to create apps and utilizes our devices functionalities. It also allows Merchants to have access to their favorite Android apps.  USING OUR COMPETITOR’S POS SOFTWARE ON OUR HARDWARE  Our platform also offers Merchants the scalability option to either use our POS software or our competitor’s POS software that is available in our App store.  Devices  https://i.imgur.com/2zEr46F.jpg  SPOS GPS, Bluetooth, barcode scanner, built-in speakers, microphone, thermal printer, 6000mAh lithium battery, camera, QR code scanner and wifi-4G capabilities. This device accepts NFC, chip, swipe payment and is EMV & PCI certified. Giving it the ability to accept both Cryptocurrency and fiat payments.  MPOS Turing your desketop and mobile phone into a payment terminal, the MPOS is PCI PTS 4.0, EMV L1 & L2 certified, MPOS keeps the sensitive transaction and personal data safe from the unyielding attempts of scams and frauds. In addition to accepting cryptocurrency, this device has the ability to accept Android Pay, Apple Pay Samsung Pay.  Baap Wallet  https://i.imgur.com/qTNMHN5.jpg   Baap wallet This wallet runs on the cloud and is accessible from any computing device in any location. This wallet will allow you to convert to fiat and vice versa  Customer private key wallet In this wallet, only the customer would have access to the private keys. The wallet would be download downloaded and installed on a PC, laptop, tablet or phone.. They are only accessible from the device that they are downloaded on. This wallet could be paired with other devices, using the same private key.

Author: Baappay
Title: [ANN][ICO] BAAPPAY - The Evolution of the Payment Platform is Here
Body: Sorry about that, we did not see your question  We are attempting the combination of both Aggregators, where merchants can be accepted instantly, however, higher fees; and Payment Service Provider accounts- if the merchant is a high volume seller, they would receive lower rates, however, they would need to apply for merchant account via underwriter. This combination will help us serve both types of merchants, offering options to smaller sellers as they progress with their business and sales. For Cryptocurrency, it would serve both big or small.   Escrow are funds that are held between two parties, via a third party, for a service or product to be completed/provided. In retailer/commercial, sellers need access to their money instantly, therefore, funds need to be transfer instanously. (i.e buying a coffee, access to a service online)  However, even in a escrow payment method, if a conflict were to arise, a resolution center would be essential in  mediating the issue.
